title: Book 2: Growing Pains
byline: Rejection, bullying, betrayal, and the awakening of hidden powers.

title: Book 4: Asteroid Tantalus
byline: A world-ending threat, intercepted by one young protector.

title: Book 5: Infestation
byline: A new sickness turns humans into something unrecognizable.

title: Book 6: Mantis That Pray
byline: Alien warriors with spiritual discipline challenge Earth's readiness.

title: Book 7: Hormigus Antanae
byline: Alien ants ask for peace, but water may be the price.

title: Book 8: Reinfestation
byline: The original invaders return, and they want revenge.

title: Book 9: The Great War
byline: Interstellar conflict challenges humanity's moral foundation.

title: Book 10: The Seven Elements of Life and Death
byline: Earth, Wind, Water, Fire, Light, Dark & Love. Enemy within and without: The ultimate battle of existence!

title: Book 11: Into the Black Hole
byline: All prior knowledge culminates. Markizano enters a black hole, where thought becomes propulsion and only transcendence allows escape.

title: Book 12: Coming Soon
byline: The final chapter of Markizano's journey awaits...
